spell_list.description: Inflicts heat damage from range and allows the ranger's next multi-hit attack to inflict additional damage. This effect can increment up to 3 with each increment allowing more multi-hit attacks attacks to inflict the bonus damage. This ability can be used when the ranger is point blank and modifies only multi-hit attacks and attacks modified by Dexterous Attacks. Higher ranks of this ability reduce the base reuse time.
spell_list.description_pvp: Inflicts heat damage from range and allows the ranger's next multi-hit attack to inflict additional damage. This effect can increment up to 3 with each increment allowing more multi-hit attacks attacks to inflict the bonus damage. This ability can be used when the ranger is point blank and modifies only multi-hit attacks and attacks modified by Dexterous Attacks. Higher ranks of this ability reduce the base reuse time.

effect_list.description: Applies Flaming Weapons.  Lasts for 30.0 seconds.
When a combat art is used this spell will cast Flaming Weapons on target of combat art.
This effect can only trigger when using multi-hit attacks and attacks modified by Dexterous Attacks.

spell_list.name: Blazing Shot
